snippet: LIFTON--Barbara Gewirtz, Beloved wife of Norman, mother of Diane and Lawrence, sister of Geraldine and Martin, grandmother of Nathaniel, Sasha and Benjamin, aunt, cousin, feminist and activist, died on February 6. She gave of herself like no other, and will be greatly missed. Please celebrate her life February 21 at 2pm at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W. 76th St. at Amsterdam Ave. Donations may be made in her honor, in lieu of flowers, to Doctors Without Borders, City Harvest, Planned Parenthood, or World Connect. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LIFTON, BARBARA GEWIRTZ
